#summary An Android example that can be used together with the JouleUnitWorkbench for the Eclipse IDE.

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Introduction =

This example shows how to energy profile an Android hello world application by using JouleUnit and the JouleUnitWorkbench. We assume that you installed the JouleUnitWorkbench already. Otherwise check the respective [http://code.google.com/p/jouleunit/wiki/JouleUnitWorkbench wiki page] for further details.
